trans-unit.source: This method returns false if the row could not be inserted. Otherwise, it returns the number of affected rows (which will always be 1).
trans-unit.target: 如果无法插入行，则此方法返回 false 。否则，它将返回受影响的行数（始终为1）。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a count to indicate the number of rows affected. This is the sum of the rows deleted and inserted. If the count is 1 for a single-row REPLACE, a row was inserted and no rows were deleted. If the count is greater than 1, one or more old rows were deleted before the new row was inserted. It is possible for a single row to replace more than one old row if the table contains multiple unique indexes and the new row duplicates values for different old rows in different unique indexes.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法返回一个计数来表示受影响的行数。这是删除和插入的行数的总和。如果一个单行REPLACE的计数为1,则说明插入了一条记录,没有删除任何记录。如果计数大于1,那么在插入新行之前,一条或多条旧行被删除。如果表中包含多个唯一索引,并且新行与不同的唯一索引中的不同旧行的值重复,那么单行可以替换多条旧行。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an integer value indicating the number of rows affected/selected for SELECT, INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, etc. For CREATE, ALTER, TRUNCATE and DROP SQL statements, (which affect whole tables instead of specific rows) this method returns TRUE on success. If a MySQL error is encountered, the method will return FALSE. Note that since both 0 and FALSE may be returned for row queries, you should be careful when checking the return value. Use the identity operator (===) to check for errors (e.g., false === $result), and whether any rows were affected (e.g., 0 === $result).
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个整数值，该值指示受影响/为SELECT，INSERT，DELETE，UPDATE等选择的行数。对于CREATE，ALTER，TRUNCATE和DROP SQL语句（它们影响整个表而不是特定的行），此方法返回 TRUE 。成功。如果遇到MySQL错误，则该方法将返回 FALSE 。请注意，由于行查询可能同时返回0和 FALSE ，因此在检查返回值时应格外小心。使用身份运算符（ === ）检查错误（例如 false === $result ），以及是否有任何行受到影响（例如 0 === $result ）。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the number of rows updated, or false if there is an error. Keep in mind that if the $data matches what is already in the database, no rows will be updated, so 0 will be returned. Because of this, you should probably check the return with false === $result
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回更新的行数，如果有 false 则返回false。请记住，如果 $data 与数据库中已有的匹配，则不会更新任何行，因此将返回 0 。因此，您可能应该使用 false === $result 检查返回值

trans-unit.source: This method runs right at after_setup_theme and applies the ‘customize_changeset_branching’ filter to determine whether concurrent changesets are allowed. Then if the Customizer is not initialized with a changeset_uuid param, this method will determine which UUID should be used. If changeset branching is disabled, then the most saved changeset will be loaded by default. Otherwise, if there are no existing saved changesets or if changeset branching is enabled, then a new UUID will be generated.
trans-unit.target: 该方法直接在after_setup_theme上运行，并应用“ customize_changeset_branching”过滤器来确定是否允许并发变更集。然后，如果未使用 changeset_uuid 参数初始化定制程序，则此方法将确定应使用哪个UUID。如果更改集分支被禁用，则默认情况下将加载保存最多的更改集。否则，如果没有现有的已保存变更集或启用变更集分支，则将生成新的UUID。

trans-unit.source: This tag must be within The Loop, and is generally used to display the permalink for each post, when the posts are being displayed. Since this template tag is limited to displaying the permalink for the post that is being processed, you cannot use it to display the permalink to an arbitrary post on your weblog. Refer to get_permalink() if you want to get the permalink for a post, given its unique post id.
trans-unit.target: 此标记必须在The Loop中，并且通常用于在显示帖子时显示每个帖子的永久链接。由于此模板标记仅限于显示正在处理的帖子的永久链接，因此您不能使用它来显示指向Weblog上任意帖子的永久链接。如果要获取帖子的永久链接（给定其唯一的帖子ID ），请参考get_permalink（）。

trans-unit.source: This tag works just like the_modified_time(), which also displays the time/date a post was last modified. This tag must be used within The Loop. trans-unit.source: Though localization is the primary use, it was often used to pass generic data from PHP to JavaScript, because it was originally the only official way to do that. wp_add_inline_script() was introduced in WordPress Version 4.5, and is now the best practice for that use case. `wp_localize_script()` should only be used when you actually want to localize strings.
trans-unit.target: 尽管本地化是主要用途，但它通常用于将通用数据从PHP传递到JavaScript，因为它最初是实现此目的的唯一官方方法。wp_add_inline_script（）是WordPress 4.5版中引入的，现在是该用例的最佳实践。` wp_localize_script（） `应该只当你真正要本地化字符串使用。

trans-unit.source: Time-related parameters that normally require integer values (‘year’, ‘month’, ‘week’, ‘dayofyear’, ‘day’, ‘dayofweek’, ‘dayofweek_iso’, ‘hour’, ‘minute’, ‘second’) accept arrays of integers for some values of ‘compare’. When ‘compare’ is ‘IN’ or ‘NOT IN’, arrays are accepted; when ‘compare’ is ‘BETWEEN’ or ‘NOT BETWEEN’, arrays of two valid values are required. See individual argument descriptions for accepted values.
trans-unit.target: 与时间相关的参数，通常需要整数值（“年”，“月”，“周”，“日年”，“日”，“日周”，“日周_iso”，“小时”，“分钟”，“秒”）接受一些“比较”值的整数数组。当“ compare”为“ IN”或“ NOT IN”时，接受数组；当“ compare”为“ BETWEEN”或“ NOT BETWEEN”时，需要两个有效值的数组。有关可接受的值，请参见各个参数说明。
